started.title: Finish setting up Workspace details
started.desc: The Workspace information set up is completed. Invite members to start using VIRNECT products at Workspace.

setting.title: Profile Settings
setting.name: Workspace Name
setting.nameComment: Enter less than 30 characters for your Workspace name
setting.descComment: Enter less than 40 characters for the description.
setting.imageComment: Update your Workspace profile image. This profile picture is displayed on the sidebar and notifications.

leaveInfo.title: Notice on leaving the Workspace
list: You are no longer participating in this Workspace including the plans and products related to it.
Data and records uploaded or shared by you will not be deleted. Leaving the Workspace is not canceled.
If you would like to rejoin the Workspace contact the Workspace master or manager again.
leaveInfo.agree: I agree to above guidelines before leaving the Workspace.
leaveInfo.fail: Failed to leave the Workspace please try again later.

message.updateFail: Failed to setting up the Workspace details please try again later.

onpremiseSetting.title: Web Service Settings
onpremiseSetting.desc: Change the customer's name, logo, and Favicon shown in the Web service. It does not apply to installed programs.

company.title: Change customer's name
company.desc: If you change the customer name, you will be exposed to the customer name instead of 'VIRNECT' in the Web Services tab / Service Title / Notification phrase.
company.caution: Changes can be made to a combination of Korean, English, numbers, and special characters (.!,@,#,$,%-,_,&) up to 20 characters.

logo.title: Change Logo
logo.desc: If you want to change your logo, please register your logo image. The VIRNECT logo is shown instead of the VIRNECT logo in your web service.
logo.caution:
Up to 3MB JPG and PNG files can be uploaded.
* Recommended size: 170 (lateral) * 32 (longitudinal, fixed)px / 72 DPI

favicon.title: Change the Favicon
favicon.desc: If you want to change the Favicon, please register the Favicon image. Web service Favicon will be changed.
favicon.caution:
Up to 3MB of ICO, JPG, and PNG files can be uploaded.
* Recommended size: 32 (lateral) * 32 (longitudinal, fixed)px / 72 DPI
